title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.13 - Insurance company medical inspectors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.13 - Insurance company medical inspectors

State Regulations

Medical inspectors of insurance companies shall be
admitted to hospitals or other institutions where injured employees are
confined, upon proper identification, for the purpose of complying with section
13-j
of the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-1.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
